---
Youtr task is write a long-form blog post, 1000 words, with subheadings from the topic. Use emojis to emphasize key points, must include a table where it is needed, include important notes to where it is needed in quote, the output should be in markdown styling. Write all output in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. [PROMPT]
